metadata.Title: CVE-2023-36053 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In Django 3.2 before 3.2.20, 4 before 4.1.10, and 4.2 before 4.2.3, EmailValidator and URLValidator are subject to a potential ReDoS (regular expression denial of service) attack via a very large number of domain name labels of emails and URLs.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-36053` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-django - 2:2.2.12-1ubuntu0.18
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-django package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:2.2.12-1ubuntu0.18').
